NPC ProcGen
Table of Contents

Namespace NPCProcGen.Core.States

Classes

BaseState

Abstract base class for NPC states.

FleeState

Represents the state where an NPC agent flees to a random position.

MoveState

Represents the state where an NPC agent moves to a target position.

StealState

Represents the state where an NPC agent attempts to steal resources.

WanderState

Represents a state where the NPC wanders around.

Interfaces

INavigationState

Interface for navigation states.
